vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐμπειρ-έω,
to be experienced in, have knowledge of, with genitive of things, τῆς χώρας [LXX+2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to be experienced in, have knowledge of
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to be experienced in, have knowledge of
vocabInfos.stepGloss: be experienced in, have knowledge of
